job.title: Software Engineer - Backend Services
job.description: What You’ll Do As a Software Engineer in the Firmware department, you will be contributing to the development of Leia Inc’s core technology consisting of display systems, camera systems, and APIs for developers.  Your responsibilities will include (but are not limited to): Contributions to all phases of software engineering lifecycle. Requirements gathering, project planning, system testing, system prototyping, and troubleshooting of existing systemParticipate in scrum/agile activities (eg. stand ups, sprint planning)Documents requirements, system architecture, test plan and test cases.Participate in the research, recommendation and architecture discussion.Projects you might work on:4V Camera App using Camera2 APIToF camera Android integrationSensor FusionHead Tracking This is a position based at Leia Inc’s headquarters in Menlo Park. What You’ll Have Experience with Android application developmentExperience with camera2 API and third party APIExperience with OpenGL graphic programmingStrong communication and team player  Minimum BS degree in EE, CE, CS or equivalent experience   Nice to Haves C++ developmentExperienced with multi-core/multi-CPU environmentsBuilding API interfaces for external app integration   Light up Life At Leia we are working at the forefront of display technology — making screens come to life in richer, deeper, and more beautiful ways. We apply our proprietary nanotechnology to give any display the ability to produce Lightfield, immersive “holographic” content — no glasses, no tracking, no fuss. Come join a team that’s ready to redefine the digital experiences of tomorrow! What We Offer In order to assemble top talent to help realize this mission Leia offers our employees: Competitive Compensation PackageMedical, Dental, and Vision PlanRetirement Savings Plan 401(k)Catered lunch and dinner daily (Dependent on Location)Stocked kitchen with healthy (and unhealthy) snacks and beveragesOnsite workout facility (Dependent on Location)  Leia Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Candidates are evaluated without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, disability, national origin, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal or state law.
